sentences.en: He lounged in an armchair in a stance of deliberate contempt.
sentences.cn: 他懒洋洋地躺在扶手椅里,故意摆出一种轻蔑的架势.

sentences.en: He sat down in the sagging armchair.
sentences.cn: 他在凹陷的扶手椅上坐下了。

sentences.en: He was lying sprawled in an armchair, watching TV.
sentences.cn: 他四肢伸开正懒散地靠在扶手椅上看电视。

sentences.en: He was nodding off to sleep in an armchair.
sentences.cn: 他坐在扶手椅上打盹，睡着了。

sentences.en: He was sprawling in an armchair in front of the TV.
sentences.cn: 他伸开手脚坐在电视机前的一张扶手椅上。

sentences.en: I love curling up in an armchair with a good book.
sentences.cn: 我爱在扶手椅上蜷作一团看我喜欢的书.

sentences.en: I sank down into a voluminous armchair.
sentences.cn: 我一下子坐在了宽大的扶手椅里。

sentences.en: I saw him sitting back in the armchair, drinking his beer.
sentences.cn: 我看见他背靠扶手椅而坐, 喝着啤酒.

sentences.en: I was so tired I crashed out in an armchair.
sentences.cn: 我十分疲倦,在扶手椅上睡着了.

sentences.en: She sank into an armchair and crossed her legs.
sentences.cn: 她坐到一把扶手椅上，跷起了二郎腿。

sentences.en: She sat in an armchair by the fire, reading a newspaper.
sentences.cn: 她坐在炉火边的扶手椅中读报纸.

sentences.en: She was sitting in an armchair with blankets wrapped around her.
sentences.cn: 她当时正裹着毯子坐在一把扶手椅里。

sentences.en: She was sitting in an armchair with blankets wrapped round her.
sentences.cn: 她坐在扶手椅中，身上裹着毯子。

sentences.en: The word " armchair " has connotations of comfort and relaxation.
sentences.cn: armchair这个词隐含着舒适悠然的意思.

sentences.en: When I'm tired, I like to relax into a deep armchair.
sentences.cn: 我疲倦时, 喜欢舒舒服服地靠在一把高扶手椅子上休息一下.

trans.tran_en: a comfortable chair with sides that you can rest your arms on
